keyMoments.title: Fukurou Defeated by Franky
keyMoments.description: CP9 agent Fukurou is defeated by Franky in the Tower of Justice, reducing the organization's active fighting force during the Enies Lobby battle.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the first CP9 defeat in the Tower of Justice battles, weakening their defense of Robin.

keyMoments.title: Kumadori Demonstrates Seimei Kikan
keyMoments.description: CP9 agent Kumadori reveals his mastery of Seimei Kikan, showcasing an advanced technique beyond standard Rokushiki.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the diverse skill sets within CP9 beyond their standard Rokushiki training.

jollyRoger.description: CP9 emblem with World Government symbol
